title: Tattered Cloth
summaries: The Tattered Cloth is a crafting material dropped by Goblin Scouts. It is used solely to craft the Goblin Battle Standard.

statistics.Sell: 6

result.value: [img:Goblin Battle Standard]Goblin Battle Standard
